name: DEBUG (AdamBadger2000)
description:
PROJECT DEBUG! 

A student project created for my FdA Games Art yr.2 games module! Long anticipated as deadlines draw closer, shrouded in the mystery of trying times and assembled with the utmost haste. Debug is a simplistic take on the typical Super Mario jumper games with a sci-fi twist! Explore the inner working of giant robots as you set out to rid them of a mysterious virus.
